t: For the director of music. Of the Sons of Korah. According to alamoth. A song.
God*pn is our refuge and strength, an*ld ever-present help in trouble.
Therefore*ln we will not fear, though the earth give way and*ld the mountains fall into the heart of the sea,
though*ln its waters roar and foam and*ld the mountains quake with their surging.
There*pn is a river whose streams make glad the city of God, the*ld holy place where the Most High dwells.
God*ln is within her, she will not fall; God*ld will help her at break of day.
Nations*ln are in uproar, kingdoms fall; he*ld lifts his voice, the earth melts.
The*pn Lord*s Almighty is with us; the*ld God of Jacob is our fortress.
Come*pn and see what the Lord*s has done, the*ld desolations he has brought on the earth.
He*ln makes wars cease to*ld the ends of the earth. He*ln breaks the bow and shatters the spear; he*ld burns the shields with fire.
He*ln says, “Be still, and know that I am God; I*ld will be exalted among the nations, I*ld will be exalted in the earth.”
The*pn Lord*s Almighty is with us; the*ld God of Jacob is our fortress.
